items.title: digital domi
items.longDescription: founding member owning product quality from early builds through production working closely with product and engineering to shape features fix issues and keep releases reliable

projects.title: domi app
bullets: owned end to end QA across mobile apps consumer web internal dashboards and admin tools from initial development to production
planned and executed test cases regression cycles and API validations while tracking bugs and coordinating fixes across teams
worked directly with product and engineering to review requirements validate edge cases and catch risks early
managed release readiness including release notes changelogs and final sign off before production launches
helped establish QA workflows documentation and release practices as the product and team scaled

items.title: wander
items.longDescription: worked as a freelance automation engineer with a small startup team to simplify visa interview scheduling and related workflows

bullets: built a conversational chatbot to assist users with visa interview scheduling and application related queries
created guided flows for form filling and document submission using backend APIs and LLM based logic
integrated application status and requirements to generate contextual and personalized user responses
automated repetitive browser based workflows using SeleniumBase Playwright and PatchRight to reduce manual effort
supported API development and testing to ensure reliable end to end automation
collaborated closely with designers and engineers to keep solutions practical user friendly and aligned with real world use cases

built a backend component to aggregate and display summarized user reviews
tested and compared API endpoints using Postman and Proxyman to validate responses performance and consistency
assisted in release cycles by supporting version control reviews and deployments through GitHub

items.title: mentiff
